tasks.label: CMake: Configure
tasks.command: call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\18\BuildTools\Common7\Tools\VsDevCmd.bat" && set VCPKG_ROOT=C:\DASI\Code\vcpkg && cmake --preset msvc-debug
tasks.detail: Runs CMake configure within the VS Developer Command Prompt.

tasks.label: CMake: Build
tasks.command: call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\18\BuildTools\Common7\Tools\VsDevCmd.bat" && set VCPKG_ROOT=C:\DASI\Code\vcpkg && cmake --build build/msvc-debug
tasks.detail: Runs CMake build within the VS Developer Command Prompt.
